entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `TypeLoadException` when invoking functions accepting arguments of type `Span<T>` or `ReadOnlySpan<T>` in certain `dynamic` contexts #74952
  • Prefer const for literals that are assigned upon declaration and not re-assigned #74943
  • Load Roslyn Analyzers from VS #74941
    17.12 P3

Closed

  • [API proposal] Syntax changes for `field` keyword #74937
  • Renaming several times automatically exit #74945
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35228.301 #74940
  • Offer "Use collection expressions" when the chosen overload would switch #74931
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35228.118 #74938

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixup partial property API usage #74951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Partial props api cleanup 2 #74950
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expressions: check conversion to ICollection<T> for spread optimization #74949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure rename cancellation is synchronous #74948
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test arcade #74947
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change Cancel() to async in InlineRenameSession. #74946
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Wait for solution to be loaded before initializing remote telemetry #74944
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: readonly backing field #74922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove deleted folder from project file #74942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Added LSP support for document color requests #74933
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use collection expressions #74920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add IRelatedDocumentsService EA wrapper for Copilot #74939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where switching to a collection expr will pick a ROS overload over an array one. #74934
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to the real System.ValueTuple ref #74936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
